name: SellTap
tagline: Sell what you need to sell to people who want them most!
body:
### Sell what you need to sell to people who want them most!
This App was created for Yu Sun's class CS 499. This app is currently in Demo stages, and is currently getting updates on a consistent basis. 

![Logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndroidDev499/AndroidApp/master/SellingApp499/app/src/main/res/drawable/selltap_transparent.png)

## You can find the App on the Google Play Store [here](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=eulee.AndroidSellTap)

### Author 
SellTap was written by E Lee, with assistance from online resources listed below:
* [Backendless Service Platform](https://backendless.com/) 
* [Jakub Ko≈õla's Sepia UI Kit](http://www.jakubkosla.com/material-design-and-freebies/)

### Contact
You can reach me at my developer email for inquiries: [euleeDev@gmail.com](mailto:euleeDev@gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
